attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Permission to Live, thats what you need when there is no choice except an organ transplant. Being seriously ill comes with a whole host of issues. Family problems, financial loss, affordabilty of medication, prescriptions. This is just for starters;the main course come with emotional problems, also you have to join the queue when you wait for an organ.Lets have the opt out system NOW, not tomarrow, there might not be a tomarrow when your on the list.

visit www.namikozturk.com and see what I am doing to help others; I should know, I have been through it.

Help me get support for this project from the goverment. All I want is for people to know about this website and the goverment to give me a helping hand with some publicity. Please help me to convince the PM to help.
